text: Achiika! Ninvuɣu shεba ban tuhiri Naawuni ni O tumo ka saɣindi tiŋgbani yaaŋa zuɣu sanyoo nyεla bɛ kum ba, bee ka bɛ kpahi ba yili, bee ka bɛ ŋmahi bɛ nuhi mini bɛ napona koŋkoba, bee ka bɛ kari ba yihi tiŋgbani shεli ni bɛ ni be. Yaha! Filiŋ be bɛ zuɣu Dunia puuni, ka Azaaba titali be bɛ zuɣu Zaadali
